name: jishoAPIDataImportedNoteType
script: const $that = this; function $(x) { return $that.querySelector(x); } const data = JSON.parse(jsonData); function setWord() { $('#word').innerText = data.japanese[0].word; } function setMeaning() { $('#meaning').innerText = data.senses.map(e => e.english_definitions.join(', ')).join('\n'); } function setKana() { $('#kana').innerText = data.japanese[0].reading; }
style: .line { width: 100%; height: 4px; background-color: #000; } .orange.line { background-color: #ff994f; } .yellow.line { background-color: #ffeb69; } .magenta.line { background-color: #ff698c; }

cardTypes.name: Kana + Meaning -> Word
